title: Sentrei
bannerText: A unified virtual workspace that never goes anywhere - always accessible from anywhere with a click of a button -
connectSubTitle: Tired of minutes-restriced video conference apps? Our virtual workspace will be always there for you - just like in the physical world
dataSubTitle: Our data analytics team will track everyone's presence on the workspace and present you with real-time updates for team productivity and efficiency
videoSubTitle: Want a remote-oriented workspace for working with others virtually without ever getting distracted? You can now focus solely on your work with the company of others all while listening to your favorite music
featureSubTitleOne: Everyone can access the workspace anytime they like
featureSubTitleTwo: We provide focus oriented features so that you will not get distracted easily
featureSubTitleThree: Track daily analytics spent on the virtual workspace to achieve your personal goals
testimonialBodyOne: We don't have any actual testimonials yet, but I assure you we will build a great product!
